metadata.title: CVE-2013-2227 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
GLPI 0.83.7 has Local File Inclusion in common.tabs.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2227` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

glpi - 0.84.3+dfsg.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.84.3+dfsg.1-1').
